title: Kannum Kannum Kollai Adithal Lyrics Thiruda Thiruda
stanzas: <div>Kannum Kannum Kollai Adithal Lyrics Thiruda Thiruda

[Kannum kannum kollaiyadithal
kadhal endru artham.
kadali vaanam kollaiyadithal
megam endru artham.

poovai vandu kollaiyadithal
pudhaiyal endru artham
pudhaiyal ennai kollaiyadithal
matcham endrey artham artham] (2)

paravaigal thondrinaal
nadhigal pakkam endru artham
paarkadal ponginaal
vaanil pournami endru artham

aalillaamal adikadi sirithaal.
.. endru artham
azhagu pennin thaayaar endral
athai endre artham artham

Kannum kannum kollaiyadithal
kadhal endru artham.
kadali vaanam kollaiyadithal
megam endru artham.

poovai vandu kollaiyadithal
pudhaiyal endru artham
pudhaiyal ennai kollaiyadithal
matcham endrey artham artham

thaavidum oadaigal nadhiyin
thangaigal endru artham.
thoovidum thooralgal
mazhaiyin tholigal endru artham

iravin meedhu vellai adithaal
vidiyal endru artham
edhiri paerai solli adithaal
vettri endre artham artham

[Kannum kannum kollaiyadithal
kadhal endru artham.
kadali vaanam kollaiyadithal
megam endru artham.

poovai vandu kollaiyadithal
pudhaiyal endru artham
pudhaiyal ennai kollaiyadithal
matcham endrey artham artham] (2)
